attributes.action: Tell us if you will be increasing aid to Syria now it has been confirmed that most of the money goes to fund terrorists.
attributes.additional_details: It seems that this government is most at ease with itself when it knows that taxpayer pounds are being used to fund luxury cars and holiday villas for despots, or even better, to fund the killing of innocents, as is happening in Syria.  Joy of joys, heh, Mr Cameron?
